rdf:Description.dc:title: Blackfoot ethnography 1986
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Kidd, Kenneth E.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Masters thesis. A synthesis of the data of ethnological science with the information concerning the Blackfoot Indians contained in the writings of the explorers, travellers and traders from the time of first contact to the year 1821. Includes information on material culture.
University of Alberta copy in the Bryan-Gruhn collection.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Siksika Indians
Indians of North America
Indians of North America
Indians of North America
Archaeology
